list_text <- list()
list_df <- list()

for(i in 1:length(names)) {
  ###-###-###-###-###-###-
  Sys.sleep(5)
  ###-###-###-###-###-###-
  name <- names[i]
  cat("Downloading data for: ", name)
  
  html <- xml2::read_html(
    glue::glue(
      "https://antwiki.org/wiki/index.php?title={name}&action=edit" 
    )
  )
  
  list_text[[i]] <- html |> 
    # rvest::html_element("head")
    rvest::html_elements("textarea") |> 
    rvest::html_text2()
  
  # Split text into sections
  sections <- stringr::str_split(
    list_text[[i]], "===|=="
  ) |> 
    unlist()
  
  # # Print the sections
  # for (i in 1:length(sections)) {
  #   cat("Section", i, ":", sections[i], "\n\n")
  # }  
  
  lifehistory <- sections |> 
    stringr::str_detect(
      "Life History Traits"
    )
  
  
  index_lifehistory <- which(lifehistory == TRUE) + 1
  
  if(length(index_lifehistory) == 0) {
    list_df[[i]] <- tibble(
      name = name,
      trait = NA,
      value = NA
    )
  } else {
    text2 <- sections[index_lifehistory] |> 
      stringr::str_trim()
    # Extracting key-value pairs
    key_value_pairs <- stringr::str_match_all(text2, "\\|([^=]+)=([^|]+)")
    # Creating a tibble
    list_df[[i]] <- tibble(
      trait = key_value_pairs[[1]][,2],
      value = key_value_pairs[[1]][,3]
    ) |> 
      mutate(
        value = stringr::str_remove_all(value, "\\{|\\}|\\<|\\>|\\!|\\--")
      ) |>
      mutate(
        name = name,
        .before = trait
      )
  }
  
  cat("...Done", "\n")
  
}

# combine data ------------------------------------------------------------

lifehistory <- do.call(
  rbind,
  list_df
) |> 
  mutate(
    value = if_else(
      value %in% c("", " "),
      NA,
      value
    )
  ) |> 
  rename(
    genus = name
  ) |> 
  group_by(
    genus
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    data_found = if_else(
      max(row_number()) == 1,
      FALSE,
      TRUE
    )
  ) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  mutate_all(
    stringr::str_trim
  )

compare_genus <- function(data, genus1, genus2) {
  # ## DEV ----
  # genus1 = "Pogonomyrmex"
  # genus2 = "Camponotus"
  
  lifehistory |> 
    filter(
      genus %in% c(genus1, genus2)
    ) |> 
    select(
      -data_found
    ) |> 
    distinct() |> 
    tidyr::pivot_wider(
      names_from = genus,
      values_from = value
    )
}

lifehistory |> 
  compare_genus(
    genus1 = "Pogonomyrmex",
    genus2 = "Camponotus"
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    same = if_else(
      Pogonomyrmex == Camponotus,
      TRUE,
      FALSE
    )
  ) |> 
  filter(
    !is.na(same)
  ) |> 
  arrange(
    same
  ) |> 
  DT::datatable()
